anya-e0813n1:3_0: Akkharāpi akārādayo ekacattālīsaṁ suttantopakārā. Taṁ yathā-a ā-i ī-u ū-e o, ka kha
anya-e0813n1:3_1: ga gha ṅa, ca cha ja jha ña, ṭa ṭha ḍa ḍha ṇa, ta tha da dha na, pa pha ba bha ma,
anya-e0813n1:3_2: ya ra la va sa ha ḷa aṁ-iti.
anya-e0813n1:5: Tattha akkharesu okārantā aṭṭha sarā nāma. Tattheti vattate.
anya-e0813n1:7: Tattha saresu lahumattā a, i, u iti tayo rassā.
anya-e0813n1:10: Saṁyogato pubbe eo rassā ivoccante, anantarā byañjanā saṁyogo. Ettha, seyyo, oṭṭho, sotthi.
anya-e0813n1:12: Sare ṭhapetvā sesā kādayo niggahītantā byañjanā.
anya-e0813n1:14: Byañjanānaṁ kādayo makārantā pañcapañcaso akkharavanto vaggā.
anya-e0813n1:15_0: 8. Vaggānaṁ paṭhamadutiyā so cāghoso. Ḷantāññe ghosā. Ghosāghosasaññā ca “parasamaññā
anya-e0813n1:15_1: payoge”ti saṅgahītā. Evaṁ liṅga, sabbanāma, pada, upasagga, nipāta, taddhita, ākhyāta,
anya-e0813n1:17: Aṁiti akārato paraṁ yo bindu sūyate, taṁ niggahītaṁ nāma.
anya-e0813n1:20: 10. A, kavagga, hā kaṇḍajā, i, cavagga, yā tālujā, u, pavaggā oṭṭhajā, ṭavagga, ra, ḷā muddhajā, tavagga, la, sā dantajā, e kaṇṭhatālujo, o kaṇṭhoṭṭhajo, vo dantoṭṭhajo.
anya-e0813n1:23: 11. Loka aggoityasmiṁ – “pubbamadhoṭhita massaraṁ sarena viyojaye”ti pubbabyañjanaṁ sarato puthakkātabbaṁ.
anya-e0813n1:25: Anantare sare pare sarā lopaṁ papponti.
anya-e0813n1:26: “Nare paraṁ yutte”ti assaro byañjano parakkharaṁ netabbo lokaggo.
anya-e0813n1:27: Saretyasmiṁ opasilesiko kāsasattamī, tato vaṇṇakālabyavadhāne kāriyaṁ na hoti. Yathā-maṁ ahā sīti, “pamādamanuyuñjantī”tyādigāthāyaṁ ‘janā appamāda’nti ca. Evaṁ sabbasandhīsu.
anya-e0813n1:28: Anantaraṁ parassa sarassa lopaṁ vakkhati, tasmānena pubbassa lopo ñāyati, teneva sattamīniddiṭṭhassa paratāpi gamyate.
anya-e0813n1:29: 12. Saretyadhikāro. Pana ime pana imetīha-sarā lopaṁ itveva.
anya-e0813n1:31: Asamānarūpāsaramhā paro saro vā lupyate, paname, panime.
anya-e0813n1:34: Sare lutte parasarassa kvaci asavaṇṇo hotīti i u iccetesaṁ ṭhānāsannā e o. Bandhusseva. Nopeti.
anya-e0813n1:35: 14. Tatra ayaṁ, yāni idha, bahu upakāraṁ, saddhā idha, tathā upamantyetasmiṁ –
anya-e0813n1:37: Sare lutte paro saro kvaci ṭhānāsannaṁ dīghaṁ yāti. Tatrāyaṁ, yānīdha, bahūpakāraṁ, saddhīdha, tathūpamaṁ.
anya-e0813n1:40: Sare lutte pubbo ca kvaci dīghaṁ yāti. Kiṁ sūdha.
anya-e0813n1:43: Sare pare antassa ekārassa kvaci yo ādeso hoti, tyajja, “dīgha”nti byañjane pare kvaci dīgho, tyāhaṁ.
anya-e0813n1:47: Sare pare anto kārukārānaṁ kvaci vo ādeso hoti. Svassa, anveti.
anya-e0813n1:51: Sare pare dhassa kvaci do hoti. Dīghe – idāhaṁ. Kvacīti kiṁ. Idheva. Cakārena byañjanepi, idha bhikkhave.
anya-e0813n1:54: Sare pare ivaṇṇassa yo navā hoti. Kata yakārassa tissa “sabbo cantī”ti kvaci cādese “paradvebhāvo ṭhāne”ti sarato parabyañjanassa ṭhānāsannavasā dvittaṁ. Paccantaṁ, vutyassa.
anya-e0813n1:56: Ettha “kvaci paṭi patisse”ti patissa paṭi, vaṇṇaggahaṇaṁ sabbattha rassadīgha saṅgahaṇatthaṁ.
anya-e0813n1:59: Sarato parassa evassādiekāro rittaṁ navā yāti. Pubbo ca ṭhānāsannaṁ rassaṁ. Yathariva. Yatheva.
anya-e0813n1:60: 21. Na imassa, ti aṅgikaṁ, lahu essati, attha atthaṁ, ito āyati, tasmā iha, sabbhi eva, cha abhiññā, putha eva, pā evatīha vā tveva –
anya-e0813n1:61: Ya va ma da na ta ra ḷā cāgamā.
anya-e0813n1:62_0: Sare pare yādayo āgamā vā honti, cakārena go ca. Nayimassa, tivaṅgikaṁ, lahumessati,
anya-e0813n1:62_1: attadatthaṁ, itonāyati, tasmātiha, sabbhireva, chaḷabhiñā, puthageva, “rassa”nti
anya-e0813n1:63: Vāti kiṁ. Cha abhiññā, putha eva, pā eva.
anya-e0813n1:64: Ettha “sare kvacī”ti sarānaṁ pakati hoti, sassarūpameva, na vikārotyattho.
anya-e0813n1:69: 23. Byañjanetyadhikāro. Kvacītveva. So bhikkhu, kacci nu tvaṁ, jānema tantīha –
anya-e0813n1:71: Byañjane pare sarānaṁ kvaci lopohoti, tatra lutte ṭhāne akārāgamo, cakārena okārukārāpi. Sabhikkhu kaccino tvaṁ, jānemu taṁ.
anya-e0813n1:75: Vagge ghosāghosānaṁ catutthadutiyānaṁ tabbagge tatiyapaṭhamā honti yathāsaṅkhyaṁ yutte ṭhāne, ugghoso, rasse akkhātaṁ.
anya-e0813n1:76: 25. Para sahassaṁ, atippakhotīha – “kvaci o byañjane”ti okārāgamo. Parosahassaṁ. Gāgame ca, atippagokho.
anya-e0813n1:77: 26. Ava naddhātyatra – “o avasse”ti kvaci avassa o. Onaddhā.
anya-e0813n1:81: 27. Niggahītantyadhikāro. Kiṁ kato, saṁ jāto, saṁ ṭhito, taṁ dhanaṁ, taṁ mittantiha –
anya-e0813n1:83: Vaggabyañjane pare bindussa tabbagganto vā hoti. Kiṅkato, sañjāto, saṇṭhito, tandhanaṁ, tammittaṁ.
anya-e0813n1:88: Sare pare binduno ma dā vā honti. Evamassa, etadavoca.
anya-e0813n1:92: Ekāre, he ca pare binduno ño vā hoti. Dvitte – taññeva, tameva. Tañhi, taṁ hi.
anya-e0813n1:95: Yakāre pare tena saha binduno ño vā hoti. Dvitte – saññogo, saṁyogo.
anya-e0813n1:96: 31. Cakkhu aniccaṁ, ava sirotīha - āgamo, kvacitveva.
anya-e0813n1:98: Sare, byañjane vā pare kvaci bindvāgamo hoti. Cakkhuṁaniccaṁ, avaṁsiro.
anya-e0813n1:105: Binduto paro saro vā lupyate, bījaṁva.
anya-e0813n1:108: Binduto pare sare lutte saṁyogo byañjano vinaṭṭhasaṁyogo hotīti pubbasalopo. Evaṁsa.
anya-e0813n1:112: Idhāniddiṭṭhā sandhayo vuttānusārena ñe yyā, yathā – yadi evaṁ, bodhi aṅgātīha – yādese iminā suttena dayakārasaṁyogassa jo, dhayakārasaṁyogassa jho, dvitte – yajjevaṁ, bojjhaṅgā.
anya-e0813n1:114: Pari esanātīha – yādese rakārassa yo, payyesa nā.
anya-e0813n1:116: Sarati, iti eva, sā itthī, busaṁ eva, bahu ābādho, adhi abhavi, sukhaṁ, dukkhaṁ, jīvotīha –
anya-e0813n1:117: Māgamo sakāre akārassa u ca, sumarati.
anya-e0813n1:120: Mādese, pubbadīghe ca ekārassa i. Busāmiva.
anya-e0813n1:123: Binduno, okārassa ca e. Sukhe, dukkhe, jīve.
anya-e0813n1:125: 40. Sare, byañjane vā pare binduno kvaci mo. Mama abhāsi, buddhama saraṇaṁ, pubbe mo paraṁ na netabbo ayuttattā.
anya-e0813n1:127: Taṁ iminā, evaṁ imaṁ, kiṁ ahaṁ tīha-issa a. Tadaminā.
anya-e0813n1:128: Issa u, akārassa ca e, bindulopādo. Evumaṁ, kehaṁ.
anya-e0813n1:131: 43. Alābūnityādo akāralopo. Lābūni sīdanti, silā plavanti.
anya-e0813n1:133: Akaramhase tetyādo sakāre garuno ekārassa iminā lahuakāro, akaramhasa te kiccaṁ.
anya-e0813n1:135: Dīgho, saṁyogādipubbo rasso ca garu, lahu tu rasso. Yathā- ā, assa, aṁ, a.
